name: Ring of Protection
description: A Ring of Protection is a magical ring that, when worn, enhances the wearer's defense and increases their chances of avoiding harm by bolstering their armor class.

name: Ring of Invisibility
description: A Ring of Invisibility is a magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to become invisible at will, rendering them unseen by normal vision.

name: Ring of Strength
description: A Ring of Strength is a magical ring that, when worn, enhances the wearer's physical power, increasing their strength and ability to carry heavy loads.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: A Ring of Regeneration is a magical ring that, when worn, gradually heals the wearer over time, allowing them to recover from injuries more quickly.

name: Ring of Spell Storing
description: A Ring of Spell Storing is a magical ring that can store spells cast into it, allowing the wearer to cast those spells later. The ring can store up to five levels worth of spells at a time.

name: Ring of Feather Falling
description: A Ring of Feather Falling is a magical ring that, when worn, allows the wearer to fall slowly and safely from great heights, preventing any fall damage.

name: Ring of Water Walking
description: A Ring of Water Walking is a magical ring that allows the wearer to walk on the surface of water as if it were solid ground.

name: Ring of Teleportation
description: A Ring of Teleportation is a magical ring that allows the wearer to instantly transport themselves to a location they can visualize or have been to before.

name: Ring of Fire Resistance
description: A Ring of Fire Resistance is a magical ring that, when worn, grants the wearer resistance to fire damage, reducing the damage taken from fire-based attacks and hazards.

name: Ring of Mind Shielding
description: A Ring of Mind Shielding is a magical ring that, when worn, protects the wearer from mind-reading and mental influence, making them immune to telepathy and mind control.

name: Ring of Invisibility Detection
description: A Ring of Invisibility Detection is a magical ring that allows the wearer to see invisible creatures and objects within a certain range.

name: Ring of Sustenance
description: A Ring of Sustenance is a magical ring that, when worn, allows the wearer to function without food or water and reduces the need for sleep, providing the benefits of a full night's rest in just 2 hours.

name: Ring of Elemental Control
description: A Ring of Elemental Control is a powerful magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to manipulate and control elemental forces such as fire, water, earth, and air.

name: Ring of the Ram
description: A Ring of the Ram is a magical ring that, when activated, can unleash a powerful force resembling a ram's head to strike a target, dealing damage and potentially pushing them back.

name: Ring of Telekinesis
description: A Ring of Telekinesis is a magical ring that grants the wearer the ability to move objects with their mind, allowing them to manipulate and control items from a distance.
